entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:13 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
